Enum Class Player

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Player>
game.core.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Player>, Constable
public enum Player extends Enum<Player>
Represents the two players in a Hex game, along with their associated identifiers and stone colors.

Each player has a unique integer ID (1 for RED, 2 for BLACK) and a corresponding stone color. This enum provides convenient methods for player operations such as switching turns and converting between ID and Player representations.
